description: Added palm mutes, made the bridge easier to play, and added backing vocals
title: Can I Play With Madness

description: Changed side sticks to snares, added chord names, added Adrian smith synth guitar and added palm mutes
title: Can I Play With Madness

description:
I cannot believe this went nearly 4 years without getting fixed...
This revision is a combination of the previous and original versions on this site. As recommended, I reverted the bass part to the original. The guitar solo (played by Adrian Smith) was moved back to its own track. Both guitar parts were re-arranged and I corrected as much as I could. Keyboard and vocal tracks were re-added. Vocal track definitely still has problems but I added lyrics anyway. Drums were kept the same as the previous version. I am unsure of the strum patterns I added in Adrian's part (specifically m. 6, 10, etc.), but that's how I've been playing it. Overall, the tab is not quite perfect, but it's one step closer.
title: Can I Play With Madness
